page.title: 03LIFE STYLES (2) HOBBIES
page.content: HELLO! MY NAME IS PAMELA TURNER.I AM 11 YEARS OLD AND LIVE IN WALTON-LE-DALE, NEAR PRESTON, LANCS.MY HOBBIES ARE HORSE-RIDING, SWIMMING,READING AND PLAYING VARIOUS SPORTS/ I LIKE HORSE-RIDING BEST AND MY AMBITION IS TO OWN MY OWN HORSE WHEN I AM OLDER. IT IS VERY GOOD FUN BUT YOU HAVE TO WORK VERY HARD -DESPITE THAT, I STILL ENJOY IT. ON SATURDAYS I GO TO SOME STABLES CALLED 'OAKFIELD' IN LEYLAND AND HAVE AN HOUR'S LESSON (WHICH COSTS ABOUT THREE POUNDS). I REALLY ENJOY THE LESSONS AND ON SUNDAYS, I GO TO MY GRANDMA'S AND GO HORSE-RIDING AGAIN AND HELP OUT AT SOME LOCAL STABLES. IT IS A SMASHING HOBBY, BECAUSE IT GETS YOU OUT INTO THE FRESH AIR AND IS A VERY HEALTHY EXERCISE. I ALSO LOVE HORSES VERY MUCH AND LIKE CARING FOR THEM.
